languages.text: "Потому что великое не делается малыми путями. Потому что если почитаешь Его — принеси ему жертву великую".
"Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."
languages.original_text: "Потому что великое не делается малыми путями. Потому что если почитаешь Его — принеси ему жертву великую".

traits.locale_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, yours must be a great sacrifice to Him."
"Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, yours must be a great sacrifice to Him."
"Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."
"Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."
"Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."
"Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."

languages.text: « Parce qu'on n'accomplit pas de grandes choses sans employer les grands moyens. Parce que le sacrifice consenti à Sa gloire doit être aussi grand que notre foi dans Son dessein. »
languages.original_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."

traits.locale_text: « Parce qu'on n'accomplit pas de grandes choses sans employer les grands moyens. Parce que le sacrifice consenti à Sa gloire doit être aussi grand que notre foi dans Son dessein. »

languages.text: «Porque la grandeza no proviene de los pequeños gestos. Porque si Le rindes culto, tu sacrificio debe ser igual de grande».
languages.original_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."

traits.locale_text: «Porque la grandeza no proviene de los pequeños gestos. Porque si Le rindes culto, tu sacrificio debe ser igual de grande».

languages.text: 「偉業は細かなやり方では達成できません。あの方を崇めるなら、あの方へ捧げる犠牲も偉大でなければならないのです」
languages.original_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."

traits.locale_text: 「偉業は細かなやり方では達成できません。あの方を崇めるなら、あの方へ捧げる犠牲も偉大でなければならないのです」

languages.text: “因为伟大的事情绝不能以渺小的方式实现。若是敬拜不死之神，献上的祭品也必须是伟大的祭品。”
languages.original_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."

traits.locale_text: “因为伟大的事情绝不能以渺小的方式实现。若是敬拜不死之神，献上的祭品也必须是伟大的祭品。”

languages.text: "Weil sich große Dinge nicht auf kleinen Wegen erreichen lassen. Denn wenn Ihr ihn anbetet, muss Euer Opfer ihm gegenüber ebenfalls groß sein."
languages.original_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."

traits.locale_text: "Weil sich große Dinge nicht auf kleinen Wegen erreichen lassen. Denn wenn Ihr ihn anbetet, muss Euer Opfer ihm gegenüber ebenfalls groß sein."

languages.text: "Çünkü kudretli şeylere sıradan yollarla erişilmez. Çünkü O'na tapıyorsan O'nun uğruna yapacağın fedakârlık da kudretli olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Because great things are not achieved in small ways. Because if you worship Him, your sacrifice to Him must be great as well."
